name: pailkit
description: Tools for builders. Built by Lunch Pail Labs.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:flow" "npm run dev:mcp" "npm run dev:widgets"
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:mcp && npm run build:widgets
scripts.build:api: echo 'No build step needed for Python API'
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:flow
scripts.test:integration: cd api && RUN_INTEGRATION_TESTS=true python3.12 -m pytest tests/test_rooms.py -v
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:api && npm run typecheck:flow
scripts.lint: npm run lint:api && npm run lint:flow
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:api && npm run lint:fix:flow
